title: Go Raw Cafe - Windmill Lane
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Las Vegas vegan cafe. In addition to a raw food menu, the cafe also offers a salad bar by weight, hot vegan soups, stir-frys (cooked). There is a retails area with health books and natural products for sale. Location is in a large shopping plaza, east of Las Vegas strip, take I-15 to 215.
